spec.description:
03/09/21
3 Tier Laravel Task List Application:
For AWS Security Group need to open ports 22 and 3306 - do it for 0.0.0.0/0 unless you can figure out the outgoing IP address for your HPOC.
Supports DB Server on AHV and Web servers on AWS / DB Server on ESXi and Web Servers on AWS - use reverse SSH tunnel with "webadmin" userid for web server to DB Server comms - so you don't need a VPN.  make sure you enter a passoword for the Mysql_password variable - this password is also used for the webadmin userid for setting u the resverse ssh tunnels.  Supports up to 4x webservers - when a user (via the loadbalancer) goes to the web page the color of the background ob the displayed app is different fear each targeted webserver. hardev@nutanix.com

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{CENTOS.public_key}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

resources.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: webadmin
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    lock-passwd: True
chpasswd:
  list: |
    webadmin:@@{Mysql_password}@@
  expire: False

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "Goodbye!"

#!/bin/bash
#Customize Task manager Application
#Setup background colors RGBs
   #0 NTNX Turq   rgb(78,178,221);
   #1 NTNX Orange rgb(242, 173, 56);
   #3 NTNX Blue   rgb(0, 53, 108;
   #4 NTNX Green  rgb(172, 209, 71);
colors=('rgb(172, 209, 71);', 'rgb(0, 53, 108);', 'rgb(242, 173, 56);', 'rgb(78,178,221);')
webserveri=@@{calm_array_index}@@
#make customizations to the php file
phpfile="/var/www/laravel/resources/views/layouts/app.blade.php"
#Get external IP Aaddress
myip=$(curl -4 ifconfig.io)
#Change Background color
sed -i "s/\#005495\;/${colors[$webserveri]}/" $phpfile
#Change web page title
sed -i 's/Laravel Quickstart - Basic/Nutanix CALM Demonstration/' $phpfile
sleep 1
#CALM specific message and IP address of the targeted webserver
sed -i "s/Task Manager v12.0/Task Manager v12 Managed by Nutanix CALM<\/h2><h2>[webserver IP: $myip]<\/h2>/" $phpfile
echo "====Done"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo rm -rf /var/www/laravel
sudo yum erase -y nginx

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y haproxy
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/enforcing/disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config /etc/selinux/config
sudo systemctl stop firewalld || true
sudo systemctl disable firewalld || true

echo "global
 log 127.0.0.1 local0
 log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
 maxconn 4096
 quiet
 user haproxy
 group haproxy
defaults
 log global
 mode http
 retries 3
 timeout client 50s
 timeout connect 5s
 timeout server 50s
 option dontlognull
 option httplog
 option redispatch
 balance roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen admin
 bind 127.0.0.1:22002
 mode http
 stats uri /
frontend http
 maxconn 2000
 bind 0.0.0.0:80
 default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebServer.address}@@" | tr "," "\n")
port=80

for host in $hosts
  do echo " server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl restart haproxy

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo
yum -y erase haproxy

#!/bin/bash
echo "Goodbye!"

#!/bin/bash
#Customize Task manager Application
#Setup background colors RGBs
   #0 NTNX Turq   rgb(78,178,221);
   #1 NTNX Orange rgb(242, 173, 56);
   #3 NTNX Blue   rgb(0, 53, 108;
   #4 NTNX Green  rgb(172, 209, 71);
colors=('rgb(172, 209, 71);', 'rgb(0, 53, 108);', 'rgb(242, 173, 56);', 'rgb(78,178,221);')
webserveri=@@{calm_array_index}@@
#make customizations to the php file
phpfile="/var/www/laravel/resources/views/layouts/app.blade.php"
#Get external IP Aaddress
myip=$(curl -4 ifconfig.io)
#Change Background color
sed -i "s/\#005495\;/${colors[$webserveri]}/" $phpfile
#Change web page title

sleep 1
#CALM specific message and IP address of the targeted webserver
sed -i "s/Task Manager v12.0/Task Manager v12 Managed by Nutanix CALM<\/h2><h2>[webserver IP: $myip]<\/h2>/" $phpfile
echo "====Done"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo rm -rf /var/www/laravel
sudo yum erase -y nginx

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y haproxy
sudo setenforce 0
sudo sed -i 's/enforcing/disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config /etc/selinux/config
sudo systemctl stop firewalld || true
sudo systemctl disable firewalld || true

echo "global
 log 127.0.0.1 local0
 log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
 maxconn 4096
 quiet
 user haproxy
 group haproxy
defaults
 log global
 mode http
 retries 3
 timeout client 50s
 timeout connect 5s
 timeout server 50s
 option dontlognull
 option httplog
 option redispatch
 balance roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen admin
 bind 127.0.0.1:22002
 mode http
 stats uri /
frontend http
 maxconn 2000
 bind 0.0.0.0:80
 default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebServer.address}@@" | tr "," "\n")
port=80

for host in $hosts
  do echo " server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl restart haproxy

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo
yum -y erase haproxy

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
#sudo yum install -y expect
#sudo yum install -y autossh
sudo yum install -y sshpass
webserver=@@{WebServerAHV_cloned_1.address}@@
echo "====webserver: $webserver"
sleep 30
#nohup ~/tunup.exp '@@{WebServerAHV_cloned_1.address}@@' 'webadmin' 'nutanix/4u' &
IFS=',' 
read -a webs <<<"$webserver"
len=${#webs[@]}; echo "len: $len"
for (( i=0; i<$len; i++ )) 
    do
      currentweb=${webs[$i]}
      echo "Start tunnel for $currentweb"
      echo "====About to nohup"
      nohup sshpass -p "@@{Mysql_password}@@" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -R 5555:127.0.0.1:3306 -N webadmin@$currentweb &
      #echo "webadmin@$currentweb"
      echo "====Done nohup"
    done
echo "====show jobs"
jobs
echo "====show processes"
ps -aux | grep webadmin
echo "====Done"

#!/bin/bash
echo "Goodbye!"

#!/bin/bash
#change sshd to allow password logins
sudo sed -i 's/PasswordAuthentication no/PasswordAuthentication yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
sudo systemctl restart sshd
echo @@{WebServerAHV_cloned_1.address}@@

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
#sudo yum -y install epel-release
#wget https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm -P /tmp
#sudo yum install -y /tmp/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo setenforce 0 || true
sudo sed -i 's/enforcing/disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config /etc/selinux/config
sudo systemctl stop firewalld || true
sudo systemctl disable firewalld || true
sudo rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm
#sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y nginx php56w-fpm php56w-cli php56w-mcrypt php56w-mysql php56w-mbstring php56w-dom git unzip

sudo mkdir -p /var/www/laravel
echo "server {
 listen 80 default_server;
 listen [::]:80 default_server ipv6only=on;
root /var/www/laravel/public/;
 index index.php index.html index.htm;
location / {
 try_files \$uri \$uri/ /index.php?\$query_string;
 }
 # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on /var/run/php5-fpm.sock
 location ~ \.php$ {
 try_files \$uri /index.php =404;
 fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+\.php)(/.+)\$;
 fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
 fastcgi_index index.php;
 fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
 include fastcgi_params;
 }
}" | sudo tee /etc/nginx/conf.d/laravel.conf
sudo sed -i 's/80 default_server/80/g' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
if `grep "cgi.fix_pathinfo" /etc/php.ini` ; then
 sudo sed -i 's/cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
else
 sudo sed -i 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
fi

sudo systemctl enable php-fpm
sudo systemctl enable nginx
sudo systemctl restart php-fpm
sudo systemctl restart nginx

if [ ! -e /usr/local/bin/composer ]
then
 curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php
 sudo mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
 sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer
fi

sudo git clone https://github.com/ideadevice/quickstart-basic.git /var/www/laravel
sudo sed -i 's/DB_HOST=.*/DB_HOST=127.0.0.1/' /var/www/laravel/.env
echo 'DB_PORT=5555' | sudo tee -a /var/www/laravel/.env

sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; composer install"

#change localhost to 127.0.0.1
sudo sed -i 's/localhost/127\.0\.0\.1/' /var/www/laravel/config/database.php
#change defaults to homestead - will do two occurences with the first sed
sudo sed -i 's/forge/homestead/' /var/www/laravel/config/database.php
#Add the password and the port

#add the password
#sudo sed -i "s/'DB_PASSWORD'\, '')\,/'DB_PASSWORD'\, 'secret')\,/"  /var/www/laravel/config/database.php

#port and password
sudo sed -i "s/'DB_PASSWORD'\, '')\,/'DB_PASSWORD'\, 'secret')\, 'port' \=\> env('DB_PORT'\, '5555')\,/"  /var/www/laravel/config/database.php

#if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ]; then
# sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; php artisan migrate"
#fi

#Is the ssh tunnel listening on port 5555?
tunupandrunning="DOWN"
while [[ $tunupandrunning == "DOWN" ]]
 do
   echo "==Tunnel is DOWN"
   sleep 10
   (netstat -tunl | grep '127.0.0.1:5555') && tunupandrunning="UP"
 done
 echo "====Tunnel is UP"
 #sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; php artisan migrate"

#Migrate database only of this is the first webserver
if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ]; then
 sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; php artisan migrate"
fi

sudo chown -R nginx:nginx /var/www/laravel
sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/laravel/
sudo systemctl restart nginx

#!/bin/bash
#Customize Task manager Application
#Setup background colors RGBs
   #0 NTNX Turq   rgb(78,178,221);
   #1 NTNX Orange rgb(242, 173, 56);
   #3 NTNX Blue   rgb(0, 53, 108;

sed -i "s/Task Manager v12.0/Task Manager v12 Managed by Nutanix CALM<\/h2><h2>[webserver IP: $myip]<\/h2>/" $phpfile
echo "====Done"

  do echo " server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl restart haproxy

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
#sudo yum install -y expect
#sudo yum install -y autossh
sudo yum install -y sshpass
webserver=@@{WebServerAHV_cloned_1_cloned_0_cloned_0.address}@@
echo "====webserver: $webserver"
sleep 30
IFS=',' 
read -a webs <<<"$webserver"
len=${#webs[@]}; echo "len: $len"
for (( i=0; i<$len; i++ )) 
    do
      currentweb=${webs[$i]}
      echo "Start tunnel for $currentweb"
      echo "====About to nohup"
      nohup sshpass -p "@@{Mysql_password}@@" ssh -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -R 5555:127.0.0.1:3306 -N webadmin@$currentweb &
      #echo "webadmin@$currentweb"
      echo "====Done nohup"
    done
echo "====show jobs"
jobs
echo "====show processes"
ps -aux | grep webadmin
echo "====Done"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
#sudo yum -y install epel-release
#wget https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm -P /tmp
#sudo yum install -y /tmp/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo yum install -y https://dl.fedoraproject.org/pub/epel/epel-release-latest-7.noarch.rpm
sudo setenforce 0 || true
sudo sed -i 's/enforcing/disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config /etc/selinux/config
sudo systemctl stop firewalld || true
sudo systemctl disable firewalld || true
sudo rpm -Uvh https://mirror.webtatic.com/yum/el7/webtatic-release.rpm
#sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y nginx php56w-fpm php56w-cli php56w-mcrypt php56w-mysql php56w-mbstring php56w-dom git unzip

sudo mkdir -p /var/www/laravel
echo "server {
 listen 80 default_server;
 listen [::]:80 default_server ipv6only=on;
root /var/www/laravel/public/;
 index index.php index.html index.htm;
location / {
 try_files \$uri \$uri/ /index.php?\$query_string;
 }
 # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on /var/run/php5-fpm.sock
 location ~ \.php$ {
 try_files \$uri /index.php =404;
 fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+\.php)(/.+)\$;
 fastcgi_pass 127.0.0.1:9000;
 fastcgi_index index.php;
 fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME \$document_root\$fastcgi_script_name;
 include fastcgi_params;
 }
}" | sudo tee /etc/nginx/conf.d/laravel.conf
sudo sed -i 's/80 default_server/80/g' /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
if `grep "cgi.fix_pathinfo" /etc/php.ini` ; then
 sudo sed -i 's/cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
else
 sudo sed -i 's/;cgi.fix_pathinfo=1/cgi.fix_pathinfo=0/' /etc/php.ini
fi

sudo systemctl enable php-fpm
sudo systemctl enable nginx
sudo systemctl restart php-fpm
sudo systemctl restart nginx

if [ ! -e /usr/local/bin/composer ]
then
 curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php
 sudo mv composer.phar /usr/local/bin/composer
 sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/composer
fi

sudo git clone https://github.com/ideadevice/quickstart-basic.git /var/www/laravel
sudo sed -i 's/DB_HOST=.*/DB_HOST=127.0.0.1/' /var/www/laravel/.env
echo 'DB_PORT=5555' | sudo tee -a /var/www/laravel/.env

sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; composer install"

#change localhost to 127.0.0.1
sudo sed -i 's/localhost/127\.0\.0\.1/' /var/www/laravel/config/database.php
#change defaults to homestead - will do two occurences with the first sed
sudo sed -i 's/forge/homestead/' /var/www/laravel/config/database.php
#Add the password and the port

#add the password
#sudo sed -i "s/'DB_PASSWORD'\, '')\,/'DB_PASSWORD'\, 'secret')\,/"  /var/www/laravel/config/database.php

#port and password
sudo sed -i "s/'DB_PASSWORD'\, '')\,/'DB_PASSWORD'\, 'secret')\, 'port' \=\> env('DB_PORT'\, '5555')\,/"  /var/www/laravel/config/database.php

#if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ]; then
# sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; php artisan migrate"
#fi

#Is the ssh tunnel listening on port 5555?
tunupandrunning="DOWN"
while [[ $tunupandrunning == "DOWN" ]]
 do
   echo "==Tunnel is DOWN"
   sleep 10
   (netstat -tunl | grep '127.0.0.1:5555') && tunupandrunning="UP"
 done
 echo "====Tunnel is UP"
 #sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; php artisan migrate"

#Migrate database only of this is the first webserver
if [ "@@{calm_array_index}@@" == "0" ]; then
 sudo su - -c "cd /var/www/laravel; php artisan migrate"
fi

sudo chown -R nginx:nginx /var/www/laravel
sudo chmod -R 777 /var/www/laravel/
sudo systemctl restart nginx

#!/bin/bash
#Customize Task manager Application
#Setup background colors RGBs
   #0 NTNX Turq   rgb(78,178,221);
   #1 NTNX Orange rgb(242, 173, 56);
   #3 NTNX Blue   rgb(0, 53, 108;
   #4 NTNX Green  rgb(172, 209, 71);
colors=('rgb(172, 209, 71);', 'rgb(0, 53, 108);', 'rgb(242, 173, 56);', 'rgb(78,178,221);')
webserveri=@@{calm_array_index}@@
#make customizations to the php file
pubdir="/var/www/laravel/public"
phpdir="/var/www/laravel/resources/views/layouts"
phpfile="app.blade.php"
#Get external IP Aaddress
myip=$(curl -4 ifconfig.io)
#Change Background color
sed -i "s/\#005495\;/${colors[$webserveri]}/" "$phpdir/$phpfile"
#Change web page title
sed -i 's/Laravel Quickstart - Basic/Nutanix CALM Demonstration/' "$phpdir/$phpfile"
sleep 1
#CALM specific message and IP address of the targeted webserver
sed -i "s/Task Manager v12.0<\/h2>/Task Manager v12 Managed by Nutanix CALM<\/h2><h2>[webserver IP: $myip]<\/h2>XXXXXX/" "$phpdir/$phpfile"
sleep 1
sed -i "s/XXXXXX/<a href=\"{{URL::asset('arch.jpg')}}\">See Architecture<\/a>/" "$phpdir/$phpfile"
#Get jpg from github
cd $pubdir && curl -LJO https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hardevsanghera/arch/master/arch.jpg
sudo chmod 777 arch.jpg
sudo chown nginx:nginx arch.jpg
echo "====Done"

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo rm -rf /var/www/laravel
sudo yum erase -y nginx

#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum update -y
sudo yum install -y haproxy
sudo setenforce 0 ||
sudo sed -i 's/enforcing/disabled/g' /etc/selinux/config /etc/selinux/config
sudo systemctl stop firewalld || true
sudo systemctl disable firewalld || true

echo "global
 log 127.0.0.1 local0
 log 127.0.0.1 local1 notice
 maxconn 4096
 quiet
 user haproxy
 group haproxy
defaults
 log global
 mode http
 retries 3
 timeout client 50s
 timeout connect 5s
 timeout server 50s
 option dontlognull
 option httplog
 option redispatch
 balance roundrobin
# Set up application listeners here.
listen admin
 bind 127.0.0.1:22002
 mode http
 stats uri /
frontend http
 maxconn 2000
 bind 0.0.0.0:80
 default_backend servers-http
backend servers-http" | sudo tee /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg

hosts=$(echo "@@{WebServerAHV_cloned_1_cloned_0_cloned_0.address}@@" | tr "," "\n")
port=80

for host in $hosts
  do echo " server host-${host} ${host}:${port} weight 1 maxconn 100 check" | sudo tee -a /etc/haproxy/haproxy.cfg
done

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl enable haproxy
sudo systemctl restart haproxy

set -ex

sudo
